War costs lives Donald Rumsfeld , who served as Bush's defence chief for six years after holding the the same job under president Gerald Ford in the 1970s, acknowledged that in a war, many things cost lives. ''A growing number of MSPs have embraced the Google Apps Reseller program,'' says an MSPmentor says Eric Schmidt 's Google has gained more channel partner momentum with managed services providers. Indeed, 29 of the world's top 100 MSPs now promote Google Apps to their end-customers. The article asks, ''Will that trend continue when the CEO crown soon shifts from Eric Schmidt to Google co-founder Larry Page?''
